channel.title: Need help with getting my server to "take off"
channel.description: Okay someone please help me. I finilaly have my server online. I cant seem to get it to take off. I am hate to say it but spamming on other very popular RSPS.(never thought I never thought i would have had to go this low) I do not know how to make it come to life. someone please help me. i really want my server to become at least somewhat popular.

item.title: Need help with getting my server to "take off"
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.source: Need help with getting my server to "take off"

item.title: Need help with getting my server to "take off"
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

To make a popular server it most likely will have to come out your pocket unless your coding is very unique and interesting. People like servers with a vps/dedi, and with websites that have paid domains(.com/.net/.org/.info/ect). And most big servers have 2-3 good programmers, an active forums, and good advertisers.

Recommend:

  1. Hire some experienced programmers (two-three decent ones).
  2. Hire some advertisers (you may need alot if your server isnâ€™t too good, maybe three-five advertisers).[these work for mod-admin, cheap i guess?]
  3. Make your website more appealing, and encourage them to use it often.
  4. Post on lots of server status.
  5. Make lots of friends on different communitys, and then ask them to join your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with getting my server to "take off"
